data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Caliente.
Throw-in high up the field for Juarez in Tijuana.
In the minute 4, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Juarez close to the penalty box.
Juarez's Jefferson Intriago gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Free kick Juarez.
Can Tijuana de Caliente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
Tijuana de Caliente's Mauro Lainez breaks free at Estadio Caliente. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Caliente.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Leonardo Javier Castillo Rodriguez.
Bryan Angulo of Tijuana de Caliente gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tijuana.
Tijuana de Caliente have been given a penalty at Estadio Caliente...
Goal! Bryan Angulo gives Tijuana de Caliente a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 18, Leonardo Javier Castillo Rodriguez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Leonardo Javier Castillo Rodriguez signals a free kick to Juarez just outside Tijuana de Caliente's area.
Juarez pushes forward through Marco Fabian, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Leonardo Javier Castillo Rodriguez signals a throw-in for Juarez, close to Tijuana de Caliente's area.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
Throw-in Juarez.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 29, Juarez to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
Leonardo Javier Castillo Rodriguez awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Leonardo Javier Castillo Rodriguez signals a Tijuana de Caliente throw-in in Juarez's half.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Can Tijuana de Caliente capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Juarez's half?
Penalty! Leonardo Javier Castillo Rodriguez points to the spot, great chance for Juarez...
Goal! The away team are now level through a Dario Lezcano penalty.
In the minute 37, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jefferson Intriago for Juarez who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Jefferson Intriago (Juarez) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Jose Jaoquin Esquivel.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Leonardo Javier Castillo Rodriguez signals a free kick to Juarez.
Free kick in a good position for Juarez!
In the minute 44, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Juarez.
Juarez needs to be cautious. Tijuana de Caliente have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Juarez in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
Juarez's Blas Armoa misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 45, Leonardo Javier Castillo Rodriguez awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
Tijuana de Caliente's Mauro Lainez gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Caliente. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Leonardo Javier Castillo Rodriguez.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
Miguel Barbieri for Tijuana de Caliente gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Tijuana de Caliente will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Juarez.
Leonardo Javier Castillo Rodriguez signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Luis Gamiz (Tijuana de Caliente) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
